articles.title: Lincoln Riley calls landing USC job 'surreal,' says leaving Oklahoma was tough but 'right thing'
articles.description: Lincoln Riley, introduced as USC's next coach on Monday, said said it was tough to leave OU but "at the same time, I knew this was the right thing."
articles.content: All Lincoln Riley had to do was say yes, take a 3-hour flight, change the shade on his red tie -- from crimson to cardinal -- and he was suddenly in sunny, 75-degree late November weather, standing i… [+4481 chars]

articles.author: Fox News
articles.title: USC fans chant 'F--- the Mormons' during game against BYU, school apologizes
articles.description: The same day USC football hired Lincoln Riley to be its next head coach, the school released a statement apologizing for fans who broke out a "F--- the Mormons" chant during the Trojans’ game against BYU on Saturday night.

articles.content:
